results.title: The Burning question
results.creator_credit: David Guy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description:
When David moved from the city, he fulfilled a lifetime dream to live in a place he had always visited and dreamed of owning. Losing almost all of his property, he is faced with a burning question in this first-hand account of the devastating Gippsland bushfires.
This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and Latrobe City.

results.title: From the ashes: stories from the Gippsland Bushfires 06-07 : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Ten locals from the East Gippsland region in south-eastern Victoria tell their stories of survival during the fierce bushfires that swept the area in the summer of 2006-2007. Weeks of preparation and anticipation helped lessen the devastation but in no way eliminated the horror and heartache of living through a time when not only livelihood is in the hands of mother nature, but lives.

results.title: Full of Life
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Coping (Captioned)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Full of Life”.
This is part of series designed for use by upper secondary students and school leavers. The transition from being a student to a working young adult seeking independence can be fraught with unexpected responsibilities and financial problems. This program describes what to expect once you begin working, together with hints on basic survival techniques and personal budgeting.

results.title: Keep moving (Captioned)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Full of Life”.
Promotes the importance of regular exercise including the positive effects of physical exertion and eating the correct foods. Designed to trigger young people’s interest in wanting to include exercise as a regular part of a balanced lifestyle.

results.title: Outside in...Skin (Captioned)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Full of Life”.
This program looks at the various things that affect our skin. Topics covered include the structure of the skin, the purpose of the skin and the things that influence the state of our skins such as diet, hygiene, age and sun. This program aims to encourage young people to adopt a healthy, balanced way of living. Rated: G.

results.title: Coping - Full of Life
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Full of Life”.
This program aims to teach young people the mechanisms for coping. Through this program we learn that fun for fun’s sake is an important part of life, that it is important to establish a list of priorities and accept that some things cannot be done, and that it often helps to talk about our problems with someone. Rated: G

results.title: Fuelling Up
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Full of Life”.
This program aims to teach young people that diet does not mean the complete denial of nice things to eat, but rather the controlled, planned intake of good quality food - the fuel necessary to power life. Rated: G
